From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of a compound of eidolon and a presumed derivative of thuo; an image-sacrifice, i.e. Part of an idolatrous offering.

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Knowledge, doctrine, wisdom. From ginosko; knowing, i.e. knowledge.
Knowledge, doctrine, wisdom. From ginosko; knowing, i.e. knowledge.

str2: From phusis in the primary sense of blowing; to inflate, i.e. make proud.

From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.

str2: From the same as oikodome; to be a house-builder, i.e. Construct or confirm.
